p: The effect of RPLO on the migration rate of MRC-5 cells was observed at 0 and 24 h after the incubation with RPLO. As shown in Fig 4A, at time 0 h, the control and RPLO-treated wells had similar areas, being the empty areas resulted from the removal of the cells. After 24 h, a higher reduction in the exposed area was observed in the wells treated with 0.5% RPLO compared to the control. The cell migration rate was statistically increased by 60% in the wells treated with RPLO compared to the wells receiving the control treatment ( Fig 4B).
